com.blahti.example.drag2

Class MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      • com.blahti.example.drag2.MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams
  • Enclosing class:
    MyAbsoluteLayout

    public static class MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams
extends ViewGroup.LayoutParams
    Per-child layout information associated with MyAbsoluteLayout. See Absolute Layout Attributes for a list of all child view attributes that this class supports.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int x
      The horizontal, or X, location of the child within the view group.
      int y
      The vertical, or Y, location of the child within the view group.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams

        public MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams(int width,
                             int height,
                             int x,
                             int y)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and location.
        Parameters:
        width - the width, either #MATCH_PARENT, #WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
        height - the height, either #MATCH_PARENT, #WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
        x - the X location of the child
        y - the Y location of the child

      • MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams

        public MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams(Context c,
                             AttributeSet attrs)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters. The values are extracted from the supplied attributes set and context. The XML attributes mapped to this set of layout parameters are:
        • layout_x: the X location of the child
        • layout_y: the Y location of the child
        • All the XML attributes from android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
        Parameters:
        c - the application environment
        attrs - the set of attributes from which to extract the layout parameters values

      • MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams

        public MyAbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams source)
